query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS whatsapp_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  country_code VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '+966',
  enable_daily_summary TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  enable_critical_alerts TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  enable_weekly_reports TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  daily_summary_time VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '09:00',
  weekly_report_day ENUM('monday', 'tuesday', 'wednesday', 'thursday', 'friday', 'saturday', 'sunday') DEFAULT 'monday',
  is_active TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  last_test_message_sent TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX user_id_idx (user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  country_code VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '+966',
  enable_daily_summary TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  enable_critical_alerts TINYINT DEFAULT 1,

  daily_summary_time VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '09:00',
  weekly_report_day ENUM('monday', 'tuesday', 'wednesday', 'thursday', 'friday', 'saturday', 'sunday') DEFAULT 'monday',
  is_active TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  last_test_message_sent TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX user_id_idx (user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
